wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Evans (10 January 1907 – 5 February 2004) was a self-taught Welsh artist from Aberdare, in the Cynon Valley. He was known best in the art world as Nick Evans, with which name his work was signed.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Evans
